Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_n0an8g2ZcU1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/0842a68b3d2e0f330e90968185781b3c/tumblr_inline_n0anddj8RE1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><span class="userContent">Twitter follower, <strong>@drewb2001</strong> cut and laser engraved this beauty for a school project. He got a 10/10 on it. If we were the teacher, we’d have given it a solid K+. Well done, Drew!</span></p>

Hmmmmm. (runs to engineering class back room)

Ideas begin flowing.
Our school "only" has a CNC router lol. That is amazing!
When my school gets a 3D printer, you just wait...

Our school "only" has a CNC router lol. That is amazing!

On top of the fact that the engineering teacher loves me, we have multiple laser engravers, a giant printer, 3D printer, and a CNC mill. Yeah, we gots da goods.
Pretty cool. Someone should 3D print a manned capsule from the game.

Pretty cool. Someone should 3D print a manned capsule from the game.

I'll see what I can do . . . .
My school has a 3D printer. My friend and I have been thinking about printing a model of a real spacecraft. This is sweet though.

My school has a 3D printer. My friend and I have been thinking about printing a model of a real spacecraft. This is sweet though.

You should make a model of a real ship using ksp parts. Similar to how people use stock parts to make real world replicas... I think that would be the best.

Just my .02
I see that lots of people have 3d printers, lasers etc. in school... **** Poland, we only have a hammer and nails.

pfff, At least you have a hammer, when I was in school we had to make the hammer ourselves.

Seriously, there was a class where we were given a piece of iron and a file, and we had to turn it into a hammer.

But really, how cool is would be to go to a school with 3D freaking printers!
nice time to make some fan ware im thinkin laythe model
